title: Handle Onboard Announcement System Failure
description: A bus driver reports that their automated next-stop announcement system has failed.

tasks.description: Receive a radio call from a driver about the announcement system failure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The dispatcher logs the vehicle defect.

tasks.description: Instruct the driver to manually announce all stops for the remainder of their trip to ensure ADA compliance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver is given clear instructions to maintain service accessibility.

tasks.description: Create a maintenance work order for the bus to have the announcement system repaired at the end of the day.
